Title: Radio Laeveld
Description: Radio Laeveld het op 1 Maart 2003 vir die eerste keer 'n vier jaar Gemeenskap Uitsaailisensie ontvang. Op 31 Mei 2003 word daar vir die eerste keer op die Radio Laeveld-senders uitgesaai. Sedertdien het Radio Laeveld reeds weer sy tweede vierjaar-lisensie ontvang en word die seinverspreiding nou deur Sentech vanaf Kaapsehoop gedoen. Radio Laeveld se uitsaaigebied dek Nelspruit, Witrivier, Baberton en omliggende Laeveldstreke van Kaapsehoop, Kaapmuiden, Malelane, Hectorspruit, Komatipoort, Skukuza, Hazyview, Sabie Graskop, en Lydenburg

Title: GrootFM
Description: Lekker Afrikaans Musiek

Title: RadioActive Rock
Description: Next Level Online Rock!

Title: Radio Suid Afrika
Description: By Radio Suid Afrika glo ons musiek is die grootste uitvinding ooit. Musiek bied jou, die luisteraar, die mees gevorderde vorm van klanke in formaat van opgeneemde musiek. Skakel in en deel in die grootste verskeidenheid van jou gunstelinge in musiek, van Klassiek tot Klassieke Rock, Afrikaans en Boeremusiek, Country en Western, Gesels programme, nuusgebeure, alles onder een sambreel vir oud en jonk.

Title: Uitsaaines Internet Radio
Description: The best South African Internet Radio, and the oldest existing one.

Title: Radio Kansel
Description: Radiokansel 657AM is al meer as drie dekades lank luisteraars se daaglikse reisgenoot. Ons prys die Here met aktuele geselsradio en lewer 'n duidelike Christelike boodskap, want ons is 'n Christelike radiostasie met Christelike waardes.

Title: Cape Pulpit 729 AM
Description: Radio Pulpit has been on air since 1981 and broadcasts on 657 AM in the greater Gauteng and surrounding areas. A breakthrough of the vision came on 18 July 2012, after many years of prayer by thousands of people, when a license was granted to Cape Pulpit 729 AM. Cape Pulpit started broadcasting on 1 December 2012 and can be heard on 729 AM in the greater part of the Western Cape.

Title: Mix 93.8 FM
Description: Mix 93.8 FM is a community radio station which aims to entertain, ispire and inform through programming that reflects the diversity of the community.

Title: Fine Music Radio 101.3
Description: Welcome to the home of Fine Classics & Fine Jazz. Fine Music Radio’s vision is to uplift, inspire and entertain our listeners by broadcasting quality classical and jazz music and presenting cultural and artistic content.

Title: Voice of the Cape 91.3 FM
Description: According to the broadcasting authority, VOC is an interest-defined community broadcaster licensed to serve the cultural interest of the Muslim community. The station’s mandate is to inform and educate the community about Islam, with an inherent focus on religious teachings. Another focus of VOC’s programming is to report matters of cultural, political, social and economic significance.

Title: 567 Cape Talk
Description: 567 CapeTalk - Live from the Mother City. Your No. 1 News and Talk station.

Title: Radio Tygerberg 104 FM
Description: Tygerberg 104FM is ’n Christen Gemeenskapsradiostasie wat in 1993 teen die Tygerberg geplant is en gegroei het tot die grootste en mees suksesvolle gemeenskapradiostasie in die Wes-Kaap

Title: Chai FM 101.9
Description: ChaiFm is No.1 Jewish Talk and Information station in Johannesburg.

Title: Life FM 100.6
Description: Life Fm is a registered Non Profit Company (NPC) Christian community radio station, focussing on the needs of the community. We specialise in 3 things at the upcoming station. We Inform, educate and entertain our audiences. We will be broadcasting 70% English, 20% Afrikaans and 10% Tswana. (40% talk shows and 60% Music)

Description: Dit kan net LEKKER raak!

Title: Overvaal Stereo 96.1 FM
Description: Gee jou oor aan Afrikaans

Title: Radio 786
Description: With an audience in excess of 150 000, Radio 786 is the most listened-to talk station in the Western Cape region of South Africa. Its programming includes local and international news and current affairs, social issues, family advice, community development and empowerment, sports and recreation. The station is known for tackling controversial, pertinent subjects head on.

Title: Radio Helderberg 93.6 FM
Description: Radio Helderberg 93.6FM is a community radio station based in Somerset West, some 48km from Cape Town in the Western Cape. Broadcasting in English, Afrikaans and isiXhosa

Title: Radio Islam International
Description: Radio Islam aims to promote the message of Islam. It has also become synonymous with Islamic values and a tool to dispel misconceptions relating to Islam and Muslims in South Africa and abroad.

Title: Highway Radio 101.5 FM
Description: After the Heart of God. Highway Radio is a Community radio station offering listeners in the Durban Metroplex a professionally presented mix of necessary daily lifestyle information with easy listening contemporary gospel music. We can be heard North, over the Tugela River, Hibberdene on the South and as far inland as the Hammarsdale region. Highway Radio is a community family friendly radio station that caters for all tastes and age groups.

Title: Gagasi 99.5 FM
Description: Radio station in Durban, South Africa, providing R&B, Afro Pop, Hip Hop, House, Kwaito music and information and educational .

Title: Smile 90.4FM
Description: Cape Town's best mix of the 80's, 90's and now.

Title: Alex 89.1 FM
Description: Elevate Your Mind. Alex FM is one of the oldest community radio stations in Gauteng. It was established by The Alexandra Community Trust and first went on air on 1st September 1984. The station is celebrating 20 years of existence along with the 20 years of South Africa’s democracy. Alex FM is a 7 days 24 hours radio station broadcasting in English, IsiZulu, Sepedi, Setswana, Xitsonga, Venda and IsiXhosa. The station broadcasts to the Greater Alexandra Community, the entire North Eastern Johannesburg and the surrounding areas. Our advantages include the fact that we are not a niche station and thereby able to target all ages and most languages spoken in the stations foot print.

Title: 70vibe-FM
Description: The music radio where the 70s musicians come to play! Our playlists include all genres, may it be funk, disco, punk, pop, progressive or psychedelic rock, Jazz, country, folk, which many performing artists and groups were known for in this era.

Title: Radio CCFm 107.5
Description: Changing Lives for Good

Title: Radio Gamkaland 87.6 FM
Description: Radio Gamkaland is in the heart of the Central Karoo. We are a community radio station which shows very good growth in the last 3-4 years. With about of 30000 - 40 000 listeners, Radio Gamkaland is indeed a good medium to reach the people of the Central Karoo. Our target market is adults, youth, disabled and children. The programs are scheduled so that it serves the broader community. The music genres we play include Religious Music, Jazz, Dance Music, R & B, Afrikaans music, etc.

Title: Radio NFM 98.1
Description: Die Stem van die Namakwa Mense (The Voice of the Namakwa People)

Title: Whale Coast FM 96
Description: We have a vision of channels of communication that create opportunities and facilitate positive change for all the people in this community. We create meaningful channels of communication that ensure our community is openly informed, entertained, enriched and educated.

Title: YFM 99.2
Description: Yona Ke Yona. YFM (99.2 FM) is a "Youth" radio station in Johannesburg, South Africa. Established in 1997, the station is formatted to mostly play urban music genres such as Kwaito, Hip Hop, and R&B along with a minority of its airtime being dedicated to talk shows. As noted by the name, the station's core audience consists of young South Africans. 99.2 YFM is Gauteng’s leading youth radio station

Title: RockNet Online Rock Radio
Description: RockNet’s playlist includes : Acoustic Rock, Hard Rock, Soft Rock, Classic Rock, Live recordings as well as music from a range of era’s and artists.

Title: Rise fm
Description: Rise FM is proudly Mpumalanga and situated in the thriving metropolis of Nelspruit We believe in uniting Mpumalanga through radio, making every effort to connect, entertain and inform its people through a variety of local language and music preferences. We’re not just broadcasters, we’re about rallying together a community of game changers who believe in making a difference – together. We want to encourage and inspire citizens to rise up and become influential advocates of Mpumalanga and the potential it holds.

If you think Joburg, you think 947. From the towering skyscrapers of Sandton, to the dusty mine dumps, 947 broadcasts the heart beat of the city. We’re with you as you wake up early to face the day, as you drive to work, as you fight your battles in the workplace, as you plan your free time, and then party the night away. We’re fun, funky, clever, cheeky, bold and, above all, interested...in you!

Title: Radio Steez
Description: We are a internet radio station broadcasting the best of alternative and authentic hip-hop from south african hip hop to boombap. We focus on the niche market of old school hip hop catering for turntablist, djs, beatmakers, graffiti heads and crate diggers.

Title: CliffCentral.com
Description: CliffCentral.Com * unCensored * unScripted * unRadio * CliffCentral.com – launched on 1st May 2014 – having taken the leap from traditional terrestrial radio to the future of internet and mobile, Gareth Cliff and team aim to create the pre-eminent “infotainment” online content hub. It’s about sharing in real conversations – everything that happens in our world – everything we all experience every day – makes us think… makes us laugh… makes us cry… makes us angry… inspires us… what makes us human. CliffCentral.com is your home and you can join us wherever you are in the world.

Title: Rainbow Gospel Radio

Title: Kingfisher FM
Description: Kingfisher FM is a family lifestyle radio station– we do radio for a very special tribe of people who live in scenic Nelson Mandela Bay & surrounding country towns, in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. Kingfisher FM is niche-casting. We talk lifestyle. Food. Fashion. Cars. Travel. Design. We talk life. Education. Health. Economy. Governance. We talk spicy opinion, connecting the people of this little bit of world with each other & the place we work & live & play. Kingfisher FM is ‘awesomeness aloud’ for ‘awesome people’ living in an an ‘awesome bit of world’.

Title: SFM 90.1 & 104.1 FM

Programme daagliks is propvol idees, plaaslike nuus en gebeure, internasionale brokkies asook taaltoffies,breinknopers, en vele kompetisies om luisternaars te vermaak. Eg Afrikaans maar glad nie eng nie! SFM klink kommersieel maar is inderdaad gemeenskapsradio op sy beste!

Title: Zone Radio
Description: https://www.facebook.com/zoneradio/ https://twitter.com/zoneradiocpt Zone Radio Online is a commercial radio station, launched on 1 April 2011 that uses the internet as its broadcast platform. It varies from terrestrial radio in that does not make use of conventional radio transmitters and can only be received using hardware connected to the internet. This is the only difference. In all other respects, it is exactly the same. The station is privately owned and generates revenue through advertising sales and feature sponsorships.
